spells.name: Lumos
spells.description: Creates a narrow beam of light from the wand's tip.

spells.name: Expelliarmus
spells.description: Disarms your opponent, causing their wand to fly out of their hand.

spells.name: Avada Kedavra
spells.description: A killing curse that instantly kills the target. One use only.

spells.name: Wingardium Leviosa
spells.description: Levitates an object in the air.

spells.name: Imperio
spells.description: Allows the caster to control the actions of the target. One use only.

spells.name: Protego
spells.description: A defensive spell that creates a shield to protect the caster from spells.

spells.name: Incendio
spells.description: Produces flames from the wand's tip, which can be used to start fires.

spells.name: Expecto Patronum
spells.description: Creates a Patronus to repel Dementors.

spells.name: Crucio
spells.description: Inflicts unbearable pain on the target. One use only.
